Come back. It’s not too late.

You have neighbors and loved ones waiting, holding space for you.
And we will love you back. ⬇️ https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1158865079305039872 QT @nowthisnews ‘I don’t want to hear the question ‘is this president racist?’ anymore.
